scripts.make: npm run make-dev && npm run make-min
scripts.make-dev: browserify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] src/react-bundle.js > build/react-bundle.js |browserify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] src/reactUi.js > build/reactUi.js
scripts.make-min: browserify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] src/react-bundle.js | uglifyjs > build/react-bundle.min.js | browserify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] src/reactUi.js | uglifyjs  > build/reactUi.min.js
